name: Just Pop Bubbles
description:
Made for GMC Jam 14 where the theme was "Memories" and the handicap was "no fewer than 5 unique sound effects". IIRC, the game fits neither.

I ran out of time to compete properly in this particular jam, so I just make a game where bubbles come up on the screen and you pop them endlessly. It doesn't even tell you how many you've popped.

Think of it as the virtual equivalent to popping loads of bubble wrap.
